definitions: strong, coarse fabric, chiefly used for heavy-duty lining or upholstery.
shortDefinitions: strong, coarse fabric, chiefly used for heavy-duty lining or upholstery

definitions: (in a theater) a piece of gauze cloth that appears opaque until lit from behind, used as a screen or backdrop

examples.text: a plain scrim for backcloth and good lighting are all that are needed

shortDefinitions: piece of gauze cloth that appears opaque until lit from behind

definitions: a heatproof cloth put over film or television lamps to diffuse the light.
shortDefinitions: type of heatproof gauze cloth put over film or television lamps

definitions: a thing that conceals or obscures something

examples.text: a thin scrim of fog covered the island

shortDefinitions: thing that conceals or obscures something
